item.title: Changing handbrake's automatic aspect ratio detection
item.description: From time to time I do screen recordings, which include a PowerPoint with an aspect ratio of 4:3. When encoding these video files with handbrake it tries to be smart about it and automatically detects the aspect ratio of the video, which usually results in a cropped video. But there is an easy fix for that. Go to the picture tab and change the cropping option to 0 in all directions.
